thread.title: Markets: trade nerves worsen as Trump advisor quits

title: Markets: trade nerves worsen as Trump advisor quits
text:
Markets: trade nerves worsen as Trump advisor quits Wednesday, March 07, 2018 - 01:41 
Global stocks and the dollar slumped on Wednesday after a strong White House advocate for free trade resigned, fanning fears that President Donald Trump will proceed with protectionist tariffs and risk a trade war. David Pollard reports.   
Global stocks and the dollar slumped on Wednesday after a strong White House advocate for free trade resigned, fanning fears that President Donald Trump will proceed with protectionist tariffs and risk a trade war. David Pollard reports.  //reut.rs/2oWUH75
